prover.gui.editor
Class LimitRuleScanner

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jface.text.rules.RuleBasedScanner
      prover.gui.editor.BasicRuleScanner
          prover.gui.editor.LimitRuleScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICharacterScanner, IColorConstants, ITokenScanner
public class LimitRuleScanner
extends BasicRuleScanner
implements IColorConstants

A specific scanner that highlight text using the specified rules. It sets a background color different from the beginning of the text to a specified limit than from the limit to the end of the text. The first part is highlighted with the color IColorConstants.HILIT_COLOR the second part with the color IColorConstants.NORMAL_COLOR.
